intro.name: Bookmark in one click
intro.note: Organize your bookmarks however you like. Our simple drag-and-drop interface gives you complete control over how you manage your favourite sites.

intro.name: Intelligent search
intro.note: Our powerful search feature will help you find saved sites in no time at all. No need to trawl through all of your bookmarks.

intro.name: Share your bookmarks
intro.note: Easily share your bookmarks and collections with others. Create a shareable link that you can send at the click of a button.
